thread.title: SalesWarp Welcomes New Chief Financial Officer
thread.title_full: SalesWarp Welcomes New Chief Financial Officer

title: SalesWarp Welcomes New Chief Financial Officer
text:
September 08, 2015 at 04:51 AM EDT SalesWarp Welcomes New Chief Financial Officer Baltimore area executive to leverage experience in finance, M&A and software to deliver growth and value to retail software solutions provider Baltimore, MD - September 8, 2015 - ( Newswire.com ) 
SALESWARP , a leading provider of omnichannel commerce management software to the SMB and Enterprise retail market, announced today that Henry Sage has joined the company’s leadership team as Chief Financial Officer. Henry is a seasoned financial executive with over 20 years of finance, deal management and corporate development experience in the enterprise software space. In his new role, he will report to the Chief Executive Officer. 
Henry was most recently CFO and General Manager of Operations at eBizNET Solutions, a provider of warehouse management software. In this role, he led the acquisition and integration of eBizNet by NetSuite . Previously, he held senior investment banking positions with FBR Capital Markets and Signal Hill Capital Markets, where he advised enterprise software companies on raising capital and M&A transactions. 
“Henry’s experience managing and advising software companies is a perfect fit for SalesWarp ,” says David Potts, CEO of SalesWarp . “We are excited to have him on the team and look forward to his contributions as CFO along with key financial and growth strategies, especially as we expand our market reach.” 
For SalesWarp , Henry’s recent hiring caps an exciting growth period for the company. The company recently completed its Series A capital raise in June and has sustained strong year-over-year revenue growth for its Enterprise software products. SalesWarp expects to continue this momentum as it launches its cloud-based SaaS product to serve a broader SMB market. Retailers will now be able to automate critical operations, manage orders and real time inventory more efficiently across all sales channels; enabling them to rapidly accelerate sales growth. 
Commenting on his appointment, Henry said, “With the online and offline retail industry continuing its rapid evolution, SalesWarp is extremely well positioned with its unique product offering. Joining David’s experienced software team is an incredible opportunity. The coming years will be a pivotal time for the company as SalesWarp launches its next generation SMB cloud product while rapidly expanding its organization to meet the growing market demand. I look forward to adding my diverse experience to SalesWarp’s management team and helping the company grow during this exciting and extraordinary period.” 
Henry earned his MBA from the University of California at Berkeley while getting his undergrad at Georgetown University. He gives back through mentoring early stage companies in Maryland through TEDCO’s MERL program. Contact Info:Ste 301 101 N Haven Street Baltimore
